scripts.network: pnpm build:happ && concurrently -k "pnpm -F ui start" "pnpm launch"
scripts.test: pnpm run build:happ && pnpm -F tests test
scripts.build:happ: nix build .#living_power_dna.hash -o workdir/living_power_dna && nix build -L .#living_power_happ.meta.release -o workdir/living-power.happ
scripts.build:happ-release: nix build .#living_power_dna.hash -o workdir/living_power_dna && nix build -L .#living_power_happ -o workdir/living-power.happ
scripts.network:android: pnpm build:happ && concurrently -k "pnpm local-services" "UI_PORT=1420 pnpm -F ui start" "pnpm tauri dev" "pnpm tauri android dev"
